description: This carbon fiber friendly polyurea grease is designed for bicycles. It's super-slippery and has impressive shear stretgth, making it fantastic for protecting bike parts, even in extreme conditions.Polyurea formula repels moisture and is compatible with other grease.Tube has threading to fit common grease guns.
name: Park Tool PPL-1 Polytube 1000 Lubricant 4oz/118ml
